description: The released tarball does not contain all of the translation goodness, since we didn't merge those back in.
title: Missing translations in Bexar release tarball

comments.content: The released tarball does not contain all of the translation goodness, since we didn't merge those back in.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Merged translations from lp:~nova-core/nova/bexar-translations into the proposed lp:~ttx/nova/bexar-2011.1.1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: See bug 714678 for a look at the resulting tarball.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
<jaypipes> ttx: translations aren't in there as binary files.
<jaypipes> ttx: still working on that...please don't merge it into bexar trunk yet :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
validating fix with build bzr651:

po/*.po files are now shipped in tarball.
The Ubuntu packages at https://launchpad.net/~ttx/+archive/nova-bexar-updates correctly build and ship .mo files in /usr/share/locale. If I install those packages and pretend to be japanese, I can see some translated messages.

We should probably check that we ship the right translations, though.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
